text:
Welcome to your work space!

Your teacher will tell you which tab to open next.

In case you delete a question from your workspace and need a new copy, you can find it below. Simply drag on the dots in the top right corner of the tile and drag it into your own space.

{Insert copies of the student template below this text tile}

Instructions and Tips:

  • First, drag the information from your client into your workspace using the 6 dots in the corner of that tile.
  • Then drag in the questions below and answer them by typing in the tiles.

Question 1

Interpret and restate the client’s end goal in your own words.

{Write your answer here}

Questions 2

Describe what is important to consider as you do the first task, keeping the end goal in mind.

{Write your answer here}

Question 3

What assumptions will you make to help the client with the first task?

{Write your answer here}

Question 4

Use what is important and your assumptions to create variable chips for your client’s eventual model.

{Write your answer here}

Question 5

Describe how your variables are related to each other and/or to the client's end goal.

{Write your answer here}
